name: Project Danmaku
description:
"Can you slip between those bullets through these platforms?"

Games that I made on lm0b beginner game jam #5.

Controls :
- WASD - Movement
- Mouse - Shoot
- Left Mouse Click - Enter 'slow walking' mode

Assets used :
- Tiny Hero Sprites Pixel Art by Free Game Assets (GUI, Sprite, Tilesets)
- Kings and Pigs by Pixel Frog
- Rumia Sprite from Tohou Project by ZUN and Team Shanghai Alice
- Kinda cute forest by Trixie
